sentences.english: Simultaneous interpretation and Hong Kong sign interpretation are available for Core Sessions.
sentences.chinese: 大會將於核心會議提供即時中英及手語傳譯服務。

sentences.english: This kind of interprets to also call to"whisper" a translation.
sentences.chinese: 這種傳譯也稱“咬耳朵”翻譯。

sentences.english: Those who specialize in simultaneous interpretations do so with the use of an ear piece and a microphone.
sentences.chinese: 同聲傳譯人員使用耳機和麥克風來實現傳譯。

sentences.english: Those who specialize in simultaneous interpretations do so with the use of an ear piece and a microphone.
sentences.chinese: 同聲傳譯人員使用耳機和麥克風來實現傳譯。

sentences.english: He's an interpreter for the government.
And they did not know that Joseph understood, for there was an interpreter between them.
sentences.chinese: 他們不知道約瑟聽得懂，因爲在他們中間有傳譯的人。

sentences.english: Interpreted by Pastor Onn Liang using Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 梁雅安牧師用國語傳譯。

sentences.english: Simultaneous interpreting (SI) is a complex multi-task activity of interpreting which came into exsistance after the Nuremberg trials.
sentences.chinese: 同聲傳譯是一項複雜的多任務口譯活動。

sentences.english: Fifth, the ability to learn two languages in the interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 第五，學會兩種語言的傳譯能力。

sentences.english: Simultaneous interpretation will be provided in these languages.
sentences.chinese: 會議將提供這些語文的同聲傳譯。

sentences.english: E stablish friendly relations between you and the speaker at a consecutive translation
sentences.chinese: 在交互傳譯時，與講話人建立友好關係。

sentences.english: I am able to take dictation in English and translate it rapidly into Dhellonese.
sentences.chinese: 我會英文的口傳條記，同時能當行將其傳譯成中文。

sentences.english: For the first time it is interpreted simultaneously in Arabic.
sentences.chinese: 第一次阿拉伯語同聲傳譯。

sentences.english: Interpreting simultaneously requires a great deal of mental concentration and agility.
sentences.chinese: 同聲傳譯需要高度的集中和靈活性。

sentences.english: The conference hall is provided with facilities for simultaneous interpretation in five languages.
sentences.chinese: 這個會議大廳配有五種語言的同聲傳譯設備。

sentences.english: Among all categories of translation, simultaneous interpretation is the hardest.
sentences.chinese: 同聲傳譯是各種翻譯活動中最難作的一種翻譯。
